summary:
*DESCRIPTION*
This is the better combinations of performance mods without bugs. In fact this will remove some bugs and CTD'S.

With this mods, you will be able to play skyrim in Ultra Graphics, even if you are playing on LOW with lag! This thing will improve our skyrim performance like you never see before!!! <
descriptionHtml:
[code][/code][center][b][color=#ff0000][code][/code]*DESCRIPTION*[/color][/b][/center]This is the better combinations of performance mods without bugs. In fact this will remove some bugs and CTD'S. With this mods, you will be able to play skyrim in Ultra Graphics, even if you are playing on LOW with lag! This thing will improve our skyrim performance like you never see before!!!

[center][b][color=#ff0000]*REQUIRED MODS*[/color][/b]
[color=#ffff00](CLICK ON THE "REQUIRED" BUTTON TO SEE THE MODS) (BELLOW THE IMAGES)[/color][/center][b]Follow the instructions of then: ALL THE MODS HAVE COVERED ALL QUESTIONS, YOU JUST NEED TO LOOK ON THE OFICIAL NEXUS PAGES.
You can skip any of the files, but is not recommended, its recommend that you install as much as you can.[/b]


[center][color=#ffff00][b]ENB USERS READ THIS[/b][/color][/center][color=#ffff00]Unfortunately due to technicall reasons this mod will only works with enb injector, if you are a enb/enboost user you need to put enbinjector to work, thats
all.
[/color]
[center][b][color=#ff0000]
*INSTALING MY FILES*[/color][/b][/center]
Download the Main file on File Tab button ^
Put the files on SKYRIM FOLDER where you find the skyrim.exe(not the data folder)
PS: After instaling Attk power loader a desktop icon wiil be added with this name > Attk , run your game now with this!! (SKSE will still run)

THATS ALL ENJOY!!!!!!!!!

[b]Credits[/b]
Meritus for Skyrim Better Performance
author: Marcel

files.name: SSME Config File Put on skyrim folder NOT DATA FOLDER
